sentences.en: They are incapable of thinking intelligently about politics.
sentences.cn: 他们在考虑政治问题时缺乏头脑。

sentences.en: A scientist once said: "I have concluded that the earth is being visited by intelligently controlled vehicles from outer space."
sentences.cn: 一位科学家曾经说过：“我已经得出结论，来自外太空的智能控制飞行器正在访问地球。”

sentences.en: Far better to design them intelligently.
sentences.cn: 巧妙地设计这笔钱效果更好。
